title: Amalfi is a very nice hotel...
text: My boyfriend and I were in Chicago for the first time to go to a Cubs game. Our hotel was right across the road from Harry Caray's. The hotel lobby was gorgeous and very modern. The room was beautiful and up to date as well. It included a cd player and a cd collection of jazz music which was a nice touch. The bathrooms were very nice. The bed was incredibly comfortable. We would definitely stay here again.
